name: Angular Material (Material Design Component Figma Library For Angular)
description:
Angular Material Library is a Figma Library based on Material Components. The goal of this file is to provide designers with the right Figma library to build rich and engaging user experiences.


👉Read the full "Why and what to built" on Medium.

👉Read the full "How to built" on Medium.


Compatible with https://material.angular.io


You can leave Figma comments to provide feedback and use issues to document design exploration, track decisions and progress.


With ❤️ made in Zürich, Switzerland 🇨🇭
